prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Samuel Young. Bond, 7 January 1830. Accession 23306, Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Ralph Slagle, Emporia, Virginia, 8 December 1948.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Bond, dated 7 January 1830, from Samuel Young to William Hendrick (d. 1857), both of Mecklenburg County, Virginia, promising to pay $50 in Virginia money for the hire of a slave named Ben. Assignments to Peter Davis (d. 1868) of Mecklenburg County and William R. Buskirk are noted on the back. Contains both the original and negative photostats.
